name: GCS to BigQuery ETL
description: ETL pipeline to move CSV data from GCS to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input_file
parameters.label: Input GCS Path
parameters.helpText: The GCS path to the CSV file you want to process.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Target BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BQ table in PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE format.
